local_intent: Align to the computed grasp pose and close the gripper on the grape, then verify object presence and grasp stability.
assumptions: Grasp pose key 'grasp_grape' exists and is valid
Robot is within reach to align before closing
coherence_with_global: Uses the same grasp key 'grasp_grape', performs alignment, executes CloseGripper with low force, and verifies ObjectInGripper and IsGraspStable as in the global plan.
